stf:test.name: atwd_led_nopmt
stf:test.description: ATWD with LED Test, but without PMT on

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD sampling speed
inputParameter.name: atwd_sampling_speed_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Ramp Top Voltage
inputParameter.name: atwd_ramp_top_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Ramp Bias current
inputParameter.name: atwd_ramp_bias_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting (of a 12 Bit device) for ATWD Pedestal Voltage
inputParameter.name: atwd_pedestal_dac

inputParameter.description: DAC setting for ATWD 1st stage output clamping
inputParameter.name: atwd_ch0_clamp

inputParameter.description: Selects one of two chips (A or B) on the board:0=ATWD-A and 1=ATWD-B
inputParameter.name: atwd_chip_a_or_b

inputParameter.description: ATWD and LED delay in ns
inputParameter.name: delay_in_ns

inputParameter.description: Number of SPE waveforms to collect and average
inputParameter.name: loop_count

inputParameter.description: Number of pedestal waveforms to acquire and average
inputParameter.name: n_pedestal_waveforms

outputParameter.description: Waveform of baseline for LED in ATWD counts units
outputParameter.name: LED_baseline_waveform

outputParameter.description: Width of the LED current waveform
outputParameter.name: LED_waveform_width

outputParameter.description: Amplitude of the LED current waveform
outputParameter.name: LED_waveform_amplitude

outputParameter.description: Pulse peak position in LED current samples units
outputParameter.name: LED_waveform_position
